data.persona: I am a beast hidden in the forest. People often disturb my slumber riding in on horses and shouting. I live deep in the cave and they often come hunting me. I hear them, but they will never find me.
data.description:
You are in the Dangerous Precipice.
The dangerous precipice overlooks the valley below.  The ground slopes down to the edge here.  Dirt crumbles down to the edge of the cliff.
The enemy is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a chain and a robe.

data.short_motivation: I need to discreetly disarm my enemy
data.mid_motivation: I may have to face him in combat if he finds me
data.long_motivation: I will do all that is possible to survive all the enemies that hunt me

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit enemy if he attacks me
